shi‡∑ära lankawa the saha ki‡∑ärakat walata amatharawa, loketama pa‡∑ärasiddha athurudahan karawim sambandhawayi. 1989 sita ada dakwama eksath jathinge manawa hamikam kawunsilaye ape rate athurudahan karawim pilibandawa nonawathwa katha wenawa. 1989 - 1992 kalayedi dakune sinhala tharunayo athurudahan kerenawa. 60,000 k pamana wu e‡∑ä athurudahan karawim walata erehi rauswim, udghoshana, kolambaa sita katharagama dakwa dina 19 ka akhanda pa gamanak wani boho wirodhatha sanwidhanaya wenne, ewakata wipakshaye hitapu mahinda rajapaksha mahathageth nayakathwayen yuthuwayi.
